title: Berries Nicotine Pearls by Nicopop
description: TRY NICOPOP BERRIES NICOTINE PEARLS Introducing Berries Nicotine Pearls by Nicopop . Enjoy the delicious taste of ripe blackcurrants, sweet blackberries, and freshly picked wild strawberries. Each pearl delivers a burst of flavors that dance on your taste buds, leaving you wanting more. Learn how to use Nicotine Pearls here . See the compete Nicotine Pearl range here. KEY FEATURES: Berry flavoured nicotine pearls 8 mg nicotine strength Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 60 pearls in each container MORE ABOUT BERRY FLAVOURED NICOTINE PEARLS Berry-flavored nicotine pearls are a delightful oral treat that brings the essence of a berry orchard to every small pearl. These pearls capture the rich, natural flavors of ripe red berries, giving you a taste of their peak sweetness. Place a pearl on top of your tongue, and the journey begins with the succulent flavor of ripe blackcurrants, adding a deep, sweet touch. The adventure continues with a burst of plump, juicy blackberries, creating a delightful balance of sweetness and tartness that dances on your taste buds. MORE ABOUT NICOPOP NICOTINE PEARLS Nicopop Nicotine Pearls are an increasingly popular and innovative way to enjoy nicotine without the need for smoking or vaping. These small, discreet pouches offer a convenient and tobacco-free alternative for nicotine users. Nicopods, also known as pearls, are designed to be placed on top of your tongue. They deliver a controlled release of nicotine, providing a satisfying sensation and helping to curb cravings. Available in various flavors and nicotine strengths, nicopods offer a customizable experience to suit individual preferences. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Nicopop Product Type: Nicotine Pearls Pouch Format: Beads Our Strength Rating: Low Nicotine (mg/pouch): 8MG Flavour Name: Berry Flavour: Fruity Pearls per can: 60 Shipping from: London, UK
